lines.text: Hello! There's a woman turned up in it. Wonder what she'll look like?
Oh... golden hair and large lustrous eyes. A ravishing creature, my dear Sims. The heroine of a mystery drama is always a ravishing creature.
Oh but this is absurd! We're beginning to talk like characters in a mystery melodrama.
I've got some photographs here I'd like to show you.
Now listen, if you try selling me any of those things I'll shout for the police! This is London, not Paris.
I don't think I've ever been considered particularly humorous. I should think I err rather on the side of solemnity... almost morbidity.
You know, proud parents and vacuous progeny.
I don't wish to appear melodramatic but I think those are blood stains.
